attributes.action: Write off all VAT repayment to HMRC for business affected by Covid-19.
attributes.background: This will be Avery quick way to get finance to SME's directly affected by Covid-19.

rejection.details:
We understand that you want HMRC to write off VAT payments for businesses, but it is not clear whether you want this to apply to all VAT payments, or just payments due during the coronavirus outbreak.

We have published a petition calling on the Government to zero VAT during the Coronavirus Crisis, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304245

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
